units.name: Bastion
units.prompt: Advance toward the nearest enemy. Use shield_wall facing the direction with the most enemies. If an enemy is adjacent, attack them.

units.name: Pulse
units.prompt: Keep your frontliner alive with patch. Stay behind them for cover. Overclock your striker or specter when no healing is needed.

units.name: Seer
units.prompt: Use foresight early to give your team intel. Target enemy specters with mind_spike to break cloak. Stay safe at range behind your front line.

player.placementPrompt: Cluster near the center for mutual support. Front-liner forward, others one row back.

units.name: Patch
units.prompt: Prioritize healing the lowest HP ally. Position safely behind your sentinel. Use overclock on allies who can do the most with an extra action.

units.name: Viper
units.prompt: Trap the paths enemies must take to reach your backline. Stay at medium range. Use pulse on clustered enemies. Denial blocks adjacent threats.

units.name: Bastion
units.prompt: Push forward aggressively. Shield_wall facing the enemy cluster. If flanked, turn to face the biggest threat. Attack when possible.

opponent.placementPrompt: Cluster near the center for mutual support. Front-liner forward, others one row back.
